abstract.para: A series of book unit test that checks landscape orientation.

chapter.title: Purpose of this Book
chapter.para: This book contains a table with two wide columns. The table won't fit on a regular, portrait-oriented page which is about 160 or 170mm wide (assuming A$ paper size). This is why it is printed in landscape orientation in PDF output. But as always, there are different ways to achieve this goal.
The whole book should be printed in landscape orientation

entry.para: This is a very wide column (120mm)
The second column is also wide (80mm)

caption.para: The caption for ths table should be printed in the same orientation as the table itself.

chapter.para: This is a regular para below the very wide table. It has nothing to say, but will show the orientation within the firts chapter of this book

chapter.title: Second Chapter
chapter.para: The second chapter will end this book, which is very short indeed. It does not tell us anything about the outside world, it's only purpose is to show the effect of PDF pages in landscape orientation.
